abstract: Martin S Feldstein Op-Ed article holds that the only real solution to plummeting American home values is to permanently reduce mortgage debt; concedes that it would be an unpopular solution, but warns that failure to act means further declines in home prices will continue, preventing rise in consumer spending needed for recovery.
snippet: The only real solution to plummeting home values is to permanently reduce the mortgage debt hanging over America.
